pullRequest.title: 1537: Fixing Null AmmoType NPE in Hangar Tab
pullRequest.bodyText:
This fixes the display error from which #1537 was noticed, but does not fix the underlying issue with the transition of bombs from MegaMek.
Commit 1 is a refactor/code cleanup, commit 2 prevents the NPE, and commit 3 rolls back one of my refactor changes.

commit.message: Code cleanup and hiding empty menus as required
Adding default return for a null ammo type to prevent NPE
Swapping back to desired object comparison using identity
